00057 using System;
00058 using System.Collections.Generic;
00059 
00060 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Interpolation.Algorithms
00061 {
00068     public class ChebyshevFirstKindPolynomialInterpolation :
00069         IInterpolationMethod
00070     {
00071         BarycentricInterpolation _barycentric;
00072         double _transformSummand;
00073         double _transformFactor;
00074 
00078         public
00079         ChebyshevFirstKindPolynomialInterpolation()
00080         {
00081             _barycentric = new BarycentricInterpolation();
00082         }
00083 
00088         public bool SupportsDifferentiation
00089         {
00090             get { return _barycentric.SupportsDifferentiation; }
00091         }
00092 
00097         public bool SupportsIntegration
00098         {
00099             get { return _barycentric.SupportsIntegration; }
00100         }
00101 
00109         public
00110         void
00111         Init(
00112             double a,
00113             double b,
00114             IList<double> x
00115             )
00116         {
00117             if(null == x)
00118             {
00119                 throw new ArgumentNullException("x");
00120             }
00121 
00122             if(x.Count < 1)
00123             {
00124                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("x");
00125             }
00126 
00127             if(b <= a)
00128             {
00129                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("b");
00130             }
00131 
00132             _transformSummand = -0.5 * (a + b);
00133             _transformFactor = 2.0 / (b - a);
00134 
00135             // trigonometric recurrence
00136             double a0 = Math.PI / (2 * (x.Count - 1) + 2);
00137             double delta = 2 * Math.PI / (2 * (x.Count - 1) + 2);
00138             double alpha = Math.Sin(delta / 2);
00139             alpha = 2 * alpha * alpha;
00140             double beta = Math.Sin(delta);
00141 
00142             double ca = Math.Cos(a0);
00143             double sa = Math.Sin(a0);
00144             double sign = 1.0;
00145 
00146             // construct chebyshev points and barycentric weights
00147             double[] t = new double[x.Count];
00148             double[] w = new double[x.Count];
00149             t[0] = ca;
00150             w[0] = sa;
00151             for(int i = 1; i < t.Length; i++)
00152             {
00153                 double temps = sa - (alpha * sa - beta * ca);
00154                 double tempc = ca - (alpha * ca + beta * sa);
00155                 sa = temps;
00156                 ca = tempc;
00157                 sign = -sign;
00158                 t[i] = ca;
00159                 w[i] = sign * sa;
00160             }
00161 
00162             _barycentric.Init(t, x, w);
00163         }
00164 
00170         public
00171         double
00172         Interpolate(
00173             double t
00174             )
00175         {
00176             return _barycentric.Interpolate((t + _transformSummand) * _transformFactor);
00177         }
00178 
00186         public
00187         double
00188         Differentiate(
00189             double t,
00190             out double first,
00191             out double second
00192             )
00193         {
00194             return _barycentric.Differentiate((t + _transformSummand) * _transformFactor, out first, out second);
00195         }
00196 
00203         public
00204         double
00205         Integrate(
00206             double t
00207             )
00208         {
00209             return _barycentric.Integrate((t + _transformSummand) * _transformFactor);
00210         }
00211 
00220         public static
00221         double[]
00222         GenerateSamplePoints(
00223             double a,
00224             double b,
00225             int numberOfPoints
00226             )
00227         {
00228             if(b <= a)
00229             {
00230                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("b");
00231             }
00232 
00233             if(numberOfPoints < 1)
00234             {
00235                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("numberOfPoints", Properties.Resources.ArgumentPositive);
00236             }
00237 
00238             double transformSummand = 0.5 * (a + b);
00239             double transformFactor = (b - a) / 2.0;
00240             double angleFactor = Math.PI / (2 * (numberOfPoints - 1) + 2);
00241 
00242             double[] nodes = new double[numberOfPoints];
00243             for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00244             {
00245                 nodes[i] = transformSummand + transformFactor * Math.Cos((2 * i + 1) * angleFactor);
00246             }
00247 
00248             return nodes;
00249         }
00250     }
00251 }
